Package jgame

Class World.Camera

java.lang.Object
jgame.World.Camera
Enclosing class:
World
public static class World.Camera extends Object
This class handles the position of the camera. If the world's zoomType is set to World.ZoomType.MANUAL, the camera also controls zoom.

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(double x, double y)
      Moves the camera to the specified position immediately
      Parameters:
      x - The horizontal position to move to
      y - The vertical position to move to
      See Also:
      • panTo(double, double, double)

    • panTo

      public void panTo(double x, double y, double speed)
      Pans the camera to the specified position at the specified rate
      Parameters:
      x - The horizontal position to pan to
      y - The vertical position to pan to
      speed - The speed at which to pan
      See Also:
      • moveTo(double, double)

    • setZoom

      public void setZoom(double sx, double sy)
      Sets the zoom for the camera. Note that this has no effect unless the world's zoomType is set to World.ZoomType.MANUAL
      Parameters:
      sx - The horizontal scale
      sy - The vertical scale

    • setZoom

      public void setZoom(double scale)
      Sets the zoom for the camera. Note that this has no effect unless the world's zoomType is set to World.ZoomType.MANUAL
      Parameters:
      scale - The zoom for the camera
